 2017-13462017-11-02,  ,  ,  GAC, 
ActJustice for Victims of Corrupt Foreign Officials Act (Sergei Magnitsky Law)
SubjectJustice for Victims of Corrupt Foreign Officials Regulations
PrecisJUSTICE FOR VICTIMS OF CORRUPT FOREIGN OFFICIALS REGULATIONS in order to (1) signal Canadaâ€™s international condemnation of the individuals responsible for or complicit in the gross violations of internationally-recognized human rights and acts of significant corruption that occurred in the case of Sergei Magnitsky and that continue to occur in Venezuela and in South Sudan; (2) end impunity for those responsible for or complicit in these acts by denying such individuals the ability to store their wealth in Canada or otherwise use Canada and the Canadian financial system for their benefit; and (3) establish a mechanism to list individuals in the future through amendments to the Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2017-0233 Publication Date: 2017-11-15
